statements: SELECT * FROM identity_verification;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM identity_verification WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM identity_verification WHERE government_id LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT full_name FROM identity_verification WHERE date_of_birth <= '2000-01-01';
SELECT id, government_id FROM identity_verification ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM identity_verification WHERE full_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM identity_verification WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT government_id FROM identity_verification WHERE id = 100;
SELECT * FROM identity_verification ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT id, full_name FROM identity_verification WHERE government_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM identity_verification_data WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, document_type FROM identity_verification_data WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM identity_verification_data ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT participant_id, full_name, document_type FROM identity_verification_data WHERE nationality = 'Canada' ORDER BY participant_id ASC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, start_date FROM smart_contract_network WHERE participants_approved > 10 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM identity_verification_data ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC, full_name ASC
SELECT full_name, nationality FROM identity_verification_data WHERE document_type = 'Passport'
SELECT participant_id, full_name, nationality FROM identity_verification_data WHERE nationality IN ('USA', 'Canada')
SELECT * FROM smart_contract_network WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY participants_approved DESC
SELECT contract_name, participants_approved FROM smart_contract_network WHERE participants_approved > 100
SELECT * FROM identity_verification_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT full_name, address FROM identity_verification_data WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT organization_name, verification_level FROM contract_participants WHERE is_verified = TRUE;
SELECT document_type, document_number FROM document_verification WHERE verification_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM identity_verification_data ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, address FROM identity_verification_data WHERE participant_id = 1
SELECT document_type, verification_status FROM document_verification WHERE participant_id = 2
SELECT organization_name, verification_level FROM contract_participants WHERE is_verified = TRUE
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM identity_verification_data ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT * FROM document_verification WHERE verification_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM IdentifyVerificationData;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM IdentifyVerificationData WHERE identity_number='123456789';
SELECT participant_id, contract_address FROM SmartContractParticipants WHERE verification_status=true;
SELECT record_id, record_date, record_details FROM IdentityRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT verification_id, verification_date FROM VerificationHistory WHERE verification_result=true;
SELECT first_name, last_name, identity_number FROM IdentityVerificationData WHERE verification_status = true;
SELECT * FROM SmartContractParticipants WHERE verification_status = false ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT record_date, record_details FROM IdentityRecords WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VerificationHistory WHERE verification_result = true;
SELECT first_name, last_name, verification_status FROM IdentityVerificationData JOIN SmartContractParticipants ON IdentityVerificationData.id = SmartContractParticipants.participant_id;
SELECT * FROM IdentityVerification
SELECT full_name, email FROM IdentityVerification
SELECT document_type, document_expiry_date FROM IdentityDocuments
SELECT verification_id, verification_date, verification_result FROM VerificationHistory
SELECT participant_id, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM ContractParticipants
SELECT * FROM IdentityVerification WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM IdentityVerification WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT document_type, document_number, document_expiry_date FROM IdentityDocuments WHERE participant_id = 2 ORDER BY document_expiry_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_verifications FROM VerificationHistory WHERE verification_result = true;
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM IdentityVerification WHERE participant_id IN (3, 4);
